metadata.title: Support Reproductive Health - Tab for a Cause
metadata.ogTitle: Support Reproductive Health by Surfing the Web | Tab for a Cause
metadata.ogDescription: Open new tabs, raise money for nonprofits supporting access to reproductive health care - for free.
metadata.causeSpecificKeywords: charity, equity, reproductive rights, community, pregnancy, educational, abortion access, health, support, empowerment, equity, gender, WOC, trans, women, nonbinary, Roe v. Wade, reproductive health, Planned Parenthood, abortion, womens health, extension, new tab, chrome, help, donation, raise money, money, easy, ways to donate, volunteer, internet, tab for a cause

landing.title: Support reproductive health every day
landing.subtitle: Every tab opened raises money for nonprofit organizations protecting and providing access to reproductive health care.

charityIntro.title: Health care is under attack.
charityIntro.subTitle:
We need to act to protect access to abortion and other critical health services.

With Tab for Reproductive Health, you can support nonprofits providing reproductive health services and advocating for policy change.

steps.text: More widespread access to reproductive health care
Advocacy for protecting reproductive rights by law

TFACIntro.title: Your tabs can make a difference
TFACIntro.subtitle: Just by opening brower tabs, you can protect reproductive rights and provide reproductive health care.
TFACIntro.img1Subtext: ###### Open new tabs on your browser.
TFACIntro.img2Subtext: ###### Earn money for Planned Parenthood and Center for Reproductive Rights.
TFACIntro.img3Subtext: ###### Protect access to safe reproductive health care.

Mission.subtitleText: To make giving back easier than ever
Mission.bodyText: We believe everyone should be able to support access to safe reproductive health care like abortion and contraception. Through our support of Planned Parenthood and Center for Reproductive Rights, you can be sure each tab you open is protecting reproductive rights and providing healthcare services.

Financials.title: Transparent Financials
Financials.text: Every tab makes an impact. Check out how much we've raised together.

smallEndorsements.endorsement: “FANTASTIC app that lets you do a lot of good things while doing your day to day work, studying for finals, or just surfing the web!”
“Raise money for charity by browsing the internet. Perfectly executed!”
“As a person who frequently enters wikipedia holes opening 20 tabs at a time.. its great to know that my procrastination can be of some use! Great app, brilliant idea”

“It's wonderful. Unobtrusive, useful, well designed, easy to navigate, and actually pretty fun! There is no reason to not have this extension. It has not affected performance and is never an inconvenience.”
“Love that this gives me, a fool with no money, a way to donate to charity. :)”
“It's a great way to raise money for charity when you don't have a lot of money ... Plus I can decide what charity to donate to, and do it on my own time. I love it!”
“Wonderful service that does great things for people in need, and all you have to do is click a button... Way better than the default chrome new tab page. So what do you have to lose?”
“Wonderful and thoughtful idea for an extension! Helping save the world one tab at a time.”
“Awesome way to give back while browsing, with absolutely no effort on your end!”
“Amazing extension. Such an awesome idea to use ad revenue from people's new tab to donate to charity. I'd rate 6 stars if I could.”

questions.question: How does opening tabs raise money for charity?
questions.answer: Every time you open a new tab, there will be a few ads in the corner of your new tab page. These ads generate the revenue that funds our charitable impact. And the best part? It's completely free!

questions.question: What nonprofits does Tab for Reproductive Health support?
questions.answer: Tab for Reproductive Health supports [Planned Parenthood](https://www.plannedparenthood.org) and [Center for Reproductive Rights](https://reproductiverights.org).

questions.question: How can I find out about new updates and announcements?
questions.answer: Stay in touch with us on social media! Follow us @tabforacause on [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@tabforacause), [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/tabforacause/), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/TabForACause), and [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/TabForACause).

questions.question: This all sounds amazing! How else can I help?
questions.answer: Invite your friends and family to join in! Everybody who joins is helping do even more to promote access to safe reproductive health care.
